prep.value: Spend up to five minutes reviewing the dramatis personae (presented in the page preceding the play) or at https://www.bartleby.com/70/4201.html

brief.value: Exploring friendships, partnerships and relationships in the play and the extent to which individuals are connected to or isolated from those around them. !
